title: Wooden Name Puzzle, Easter Gift for Kids, Name Puzzles for Toddlers, Montessori, First Birthday, Baby Shower Gift, Custom Name Puzzle
description: Our personalized name puzzles make the perfect gift!A gift you love giving, our wooden name puzzles are a wonderful learning toy to give a toddler or baby for Easter, Birthdays, baby showers and as a new baby gift.  They are a fun "just because I love you gift" and a great way to encourage letter and name recognition.•	FREE Shipping!•	Super cute gift shows you care•	Fun and educational•	Display Stand available separately (see link below)Puzzles are a fun learning toy that encourage name recognition, spelling, and fine motor skills.  They are time tested and never go out of style.  Made of high quality baltic birch, our puzzles are 4.5" tall and the length varies based on the length of the name.  The puzzles typically range from 10" long, to a maximum length of 30" based on the number of letters and shapes. The letters are approximately 3" high, the perfect size to grab for your young learner.  All of the puzzle pieces are raised, making it easy to get them out and play with. We use non-toxic paint, eco-friendly ink, and a food grade non-toxic wood sealer that is child friendly.COLOR OPTIONS:  Please choose from below, or send us a message to customize with any available colorsShown on Color Options Page 1-1. Adventure:  Dark Green, Brown, Green, Spice, Dark Grey2. Mint & Navy:  Navy, Mint, Dark Grey, Light Grey3. Earthy:  Rust, Warm Sand, Peach, Spice4. Primary: Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Sky Blue, Royal BlueShown on Color Options Page 2-5. Pink and Gold: Pink, Blush, Gold6. Coral & Mint: Coral, Mint, Blush7. Rose Dust: Rose Dust, Warm Sand, Peach8. Berry Fun: Bright Pink, Purple, Turquoise, MintThe exact colors used and order of the colors will vary from puzzle to puzzle.  The number of colors used varies based on the number of letters in a name.  Due to differences in monitors and devices, the colors may appear slightly different than shown on your screen.  If you have a specific request, please leave it in the Notes to Seller and we are happy to accommodate you if we can.  We are not able to include special characters like hyphens or apostrophes in our puzzles.  Our puzzles only include uppercase letters, without any special characters.FREE SHIPPING: We offer FREE 2 Day Shipping on most orders via UPS 2 Day Air.  In select locations that we are unable to ship UPS, such as PO Boxes, Hawaii, and Alaska, as well as rural locations without UPS delivery, we ship via USPS Priority Mail.RETURNS: We do not accept returns on customized items.  However, if you have any questions or concerns with your order, please don't hesitate to reach out.  Our number one goal is that you LOVE your order!  If we make a mistake, we will always make it right for you.CANCELLATIONS: We work hard to start work on your order as soon as possible!  Due to our quick processing time and the personalized nature of this product, we are currently unable to accept cancellations after the order is placed.  If you have any questions, feel free to reach out before placing your order. Thank you!

title: Blanket & Hat Set - Personalized Plush Minky and Baby Hat
description: Classic, adorable, and perfectly giftable, this personalized blanket and hat set is perfect for baby shower gifts, coming home outfits, newborn hospital photos, or for everyday use.This listing is for a personalized set that includes 2 items:1 WHITE plush minky blanket with color text1 COLOR stretchy jersey hat with white textChoose your font and color from the drop down menus. Please review spelling carefully.Because each font and name combination varies, please double check the preview page on our website to make sure you are happy with the font choice before completing your purchase here on Etsy. We do not send proofs unless requested.----- CARE INSTRUCTIONS ------To keep the fibers soft and silky over time, it is very important to avoid fabric softeners when washing this blanket. Many laundry pods contain softeners, and we recommend not using laundry pods for this item.Blanket care:- Wash with detergent only, no fabric softeners- Wash with like colors only (whites)- Tumble dry low and remove promptlyHat care:- Spot clean or machine wash with no fabric softener- Wash with like colors- Lay flat to dryBlankets are designed and finished at our shop in Utah using imported materials. 100% polyester minky.Hats are made at our shop in Utah. 95% polyester 5% spandex double brushed jersey.

title: Pendant Ceramic Lamp, Hanging Lampshade, Handmade Design, Contemporary Artwork Creation, Unique Light Fixture Gift
description: Pendant Ceramic Lamp, Hanging Lampshade, Handmade Design, Contemporary Artwork Creation, Unique Light Fixture Gift, Suitable for Living Room Center & Office by Noa RazerThis piece was created in the innovative studio of the designer-maker Noa Razer, which is located in Tel Aviv, Israel, and It is part of the Apilar collection.The Apilar collection ('stack' in Spanish) began to take shape during a family roots trip to southern Spain, influenced by the differentiated and unique Spanish ceramics. In this collection, there are nine different shapes, from which all structures of the collection are built. Countless creation options are formed by stacking the shapes one on top of the other into new complex compositions with spectacular colors.On top of the pieces are ceramic prints, inspired by traditions from different cultures, creating a contemporary cultural collage.The designer is engaged in ongoing research, visual as well as theoretical, focusing on ‏traditional ceramics as a cultural carrier and ‏searching for a sense of belonging through the local material culture.Color: Green, pink, tealMeasurements:Height	5.9 inchDiameter of 5.5 inch
